varlistentry.listitem: : This function returns 0 on success and -1 on error.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function initializes the HIDAPI library. Calling it is not strictly necessary, as it will be called automatically by hid_enumerate() and any of the hid_open_*() functions (internal funtions of the library), if it is needed. This function should be called at the beginning of execution however, if there is a chance of HIDAPI handles being opened by different threads simultaneously.
If the device its not closed once have been opened Scilab, eventualy, will crash down because a segmentation fault
